sentences.en: Channel Tunnel sections started from the United Kingdom and France meet 40 meters beneath the seabed.
sentences.cn: 1990年海底隧道从英国到法兰西段在海床下40米处开通.

sentences.en: Earth movements in the past elevated great areas of the seabed.
sentences.cn: 地球过去的运动使海底大片地区隆起.

sentences.en: Embankment shell variety, mostly for the intertidal zone or shallow seabed sediment mollusc species present health.
sentences.cn: 堤上贝壳种类丰富, 多为潮间带或浅海泥沙海底软体动物的现生种属.

sentences.en: Everywhere, these mostly seabed eruptions are changing the environment.
sentences.cn: 每到一处, 这些大多是海底火山喷发.

sentences.en: Much of the seabed is covered by marine mud with some scattered sand banks.
sentences.cn: 大部分海床都为海泥和零散的沙洲所覆盖.

sentences.en: The cylinder was lifted from the seabed in a sling.
The design of underwater beveling machinelaying of seabed oil & gas pipelines installation and service.
sentences.cn: 设计了专门用于海底 油气 输送管道安装、维修的水下坡口机.

sentences.en: The engineer studies seabed mining technology.
sentences.cn: 这位工程师研究海床采矿技术.

sentences.en: The virtual reality simulation system of seabed deep - seaVehicle ( HOV ) is presented.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了一种基于虚拟现实的深潜器运动仿真设计思想.

sentences.en: The wreck was raised from the seabed in June 2000.
sentences.cn: 沉船于2000年6月从海底打捞上来。

sentences.en: Three steel cables running to the seabed prevent it from floating away.
sentences.cn: 三条与海底相连的钢缆确保了它的稳固性.

sentences.en: Two other companies have shown serious interest in seabed mining.
sentences.cn: 另外两家公司对海底矿产显出浓厚的兴趣.

sentences.en: Under the seabed there are many submerged reefs.
What forces could possibly have raised the seabed to these heights?
sentences.cn: 有甚么力量能力能将海底升至这个高度?

sentences.en: What happens on the seabed is beyond my ken.
sentences.cn: 海底发生的事情我不甚了解.

sentences.en: While hunting on the 3 seabed they emitted a 4 ) weird 5 ) medium frequency noise.
sentences.cn: 在海底猎食时,们发出一种奇怪的中频率杂音.
